name: io.bytes.per.checksum
relevant log: 1-ERROR	Thread Thread[eventHandlingThread,5,main] threw an Exception.org.apache.hadoop.HadoopIllegalArgumentException: Invalid checksum type: userOpt=null, default=CRC32C:0, effective=null
explanation: The configuration 'io.bytes.per.checksum' is set to 0 which is causing the Invalid checksum type error. This configuration should be set to a value greater than 0 to avoid this error.

name: dfs.namenode.missing.checkpoint.periods.before.shutdown
relevant log: 1-ERROR	Thread Thread[eventHandlingThread,5,main] threw an Exception.org.apache.hadoop.HadoopIllegalArgumentException: Invalid checksum type: userOpt=null, default=CRC32C:0, effective=null
explanation: The configuration 'dfs.namenode.missing.checkpoint.periods.before.shutdown' is set to 3. This might be causing the system to shutdown before the checkpoint is created, leading to the Invalid checksum type error. Increasing the value might solve the issue.

name: dfs.datanode.directoryscan.interval
relevant log: 1-ERROR	Thread Thread[eventHandlingThread,5,main] threw an Exception.org.apache.hadoop.HadoopIllegalArgumentException: Invalid checksum type: userOpt=null, default=CRC32C:0, effective=null
explanation: The configuration 'dfs.datanode.directoryscan.interval' is set to 21600. This might be causing the system to scan data directories and reconcile the difference between blocks in memory and on the disk at a high frequency, leading to the Invalid checksum type error. Decreasing the value might solve the issue.
